short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add custom keyboard shortcuts to HubSpot for improved navigation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
● Navigation Shortcuts: Jump to HubSpot pages using single key presses.
● Action Shortcuts: Perform common actions on pages with single key presses.

Navigation Shortcuts

● D			Jump to Deals
● L			Jump to Leads
● S			Jump to Sequences
● Ctrl+Enter	Save/Send

Action Shortcuts

● N	Select Create New Button
● A	Select All Records
● E	Enroll in Sequence

Contributing

Contributions are welcome! If you have suggestions for new shortcuts or improvements, please open an issue or submit a PR on Github.
